def_cn: (旅馆等提供的)叫醒电话，叫醒服务
def_en: A wake-up call is a telephone call that you can book through an operator or at a hotel to make sure that you wake up at a particular time.
If you say that something is a wake-up call to a person or group of people, you mean that it will make them notice something and start to take action.
